note:
I started with app.net as either jgordon or johngordon. Then to Twitter as @jgordonshares. My avatar features our dog Kateva who passed a few years ago.

Gordon is my middle name. Iâ€™m basically a petty bourgeois intellectual (Lib). I distrust confidence.

I know things about primary care medicine, medical informatics, and special needs. For fun I road, singletrack and snow bike, XC ski, inline skate, travel, play hockey, and do CrossFit.
